channel.title: Watch out for this player!
channel.description:
Recently I had a player disrupt my entire server. He normaly logs on as a name like this:
+your name+ ur gay or +your name+ dik
Or anything like that. Because what he did on my server was so serious I'm going to post his ip. If this is not allowed, will a Mod or Admin change the post please, I do not want another ban.
IP: AC8FACF1.ipt.aol.com
DONT SAY I DIDNT WARN YOU!
